column1: I wish quick recovery for talented @TOLOnews Journalists. I am sure they will win the coronavirus and will be back to serve to Afghanistan Media back.

The #kabul_Administration says: positive cases of coronavirus at Pule-Charkhi #prison has reached to 75.even more prisoners r addicted to corona.#US must act on #Doha_agrmnt otherwis they r directly responsible for this catastrophe @US4AfghanPeace @StateDept @USAmbKabul @USFOR_A

This is why I am saying #COVID19 should be dealt in time and cautiously in #Afghanistan. In this video, people in Ghazni are vowing and praying to repel the virus. Afghans ‚Äî even in major cities ‚Äî have no proper access to medication. This can be awfully dangerous!

What measures are in place to prevent public outbreak of the COVID19 ? How well is the quarantine facility secured? Was this person tested and isolated at the airport or was it a reported case of symptoms that led to the discovery of the first COVID19 case in Nigeria?
